participant_1.background:
I like to read about puppy training and dog care on my lunch breaks.
i enjoy swimming.
I'm enjoying my time after college, jogging is a great way to stay in shape.
I don't own a home, but I do enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners.
i am from tennessee.

participant_2.background:
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i am a lesbian.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
i still love to line dry my clothes.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! Where are you from?
I'm from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals. What about you?
I'm from Tennessee! I like to swim and play music. I also enjoy reading about puppy training and dog care.
That's cool! I love swimming too. I've been married to my high school sweetheart for 10 years now. We're both lesbians.
Congratulations! That's wonderful! I'm glad to hear that you're happy.
Thank you! I'm also happy to hear that you're doing well.
Thanks! I'm enjoying my time after college. I don't own a home yet, but I do enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying your time after college. I love trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town. I also still love to line dry my clothes.
That's cool! I've been trying to learn how to cook more ethnic foods. I also love to line dry my clothes. It's so much more environmentally friendly than using a dryer.
Exactly! I'm glad to hear that you're also trying to be more environmentally friendly.
Me too! I think it's important to do what we can to take care of the planet.
